name: The Fight of Konoha 2
description:
The Fight of Konoha 2: New Dimension

The next Generation of The Fight of Konoha. A new Way to Kill your opponent. Chakra witch reload and the Shuriken are Limited. New Healing Items. A new dangerous Map named Amegakure. A lot of fun with your friends. 

How To Play the Game you can read in the Options Menu in my Game.

Enjoy the Game!!
